email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The MV Oceanic Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Please confirm the demurrage terms and send over the draft charter party for review. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. The laycan is confirmed, and demurrage terms are as discussed: $25,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll send the draft charter party by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
